title: ‘Below Deck Mediterranean,’ ‘Real Housewives,’ ‘The Challenge,’ ‘Married at First Sight,’ and ‘Sweet Life’ | Reality Top Five
description:
1. Juliet and Callie break down this week’s drama on ‘Real Housewives of Beverly Hills’ at the Rinna makeup event (0:30).
2. Callie catches Juliet up on the current season of ‘Real Housewives of Potomac,’ including Wendy’s off screen transformation and rumors of her husband’s infidelity (22:00).
3. Juliet shares her love for the warm blanket that is ‘Below Deck Mediterranean,’ which has recently gained a new cast member, Delaney (37:50).
4. They talk about how Tommy ended up naked during the cliff jump challenge on ‘The Challenge’ and how much they miss the older vets like CT and Nany who aren’t getting a ton of screen time this season (45:20).
5. Last up, they do a speed round of shows that they’ve started watching or been told they need to watch, including ‘Sweet Life,’ ‘Married at First Sight,’ ‘Ultimate Surfer’ and ‘100 Foot Wave,’ and ‘Family or Fiancé' (52:50).
Hosts: Juliet Litman and Callie Curry
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
